Whether the speak action was successful

200.description: Gather DTMF/speech input using speak, audio, or AI

success.description: Whether the gather action was successful

websocket_url.description: Optional WebSocket URL for audio streaming

success.description: Whether the answer action was successful
Whether the reject action was successful

to.description: Recipient's phone number. Must be in E.164 format

from.description: Phone number to call from. Must be in E.164 format

webhook_url.description: Optional webhook URL for call events

websocket_url.description: Optional WebSocket URL for audio streaming

call_id.description: The call's ID. Use it to refer to this call in the future, when controlling the call or checking its status.

200.description: Get live call status from Telnyx

to.description: Phone number to transfer to. Must be in E.164 format
